/*splash Main*/ Next skip GET STARTED
/*Main*/ Is the best place to manage 
 yourBlood Donation it describes donation process log in Create An Acoount
/*splash0*/ donation process “There is no great joy than saving 
 a soul.” Opportunities knock the door sometimes,
 so don’t let it go and donate blood.
/*splash1*/ Every Blood Donor Is A Hero A single pint can save three lives, 
 a single gesture can create a million smiles /*splash2*/ loction For Donation A few drops of your blood can help a life to bloom all blood banks and campaigns locations are 
 located in map so it became more easier to get to 
 the nearest place /*splash3*/ Be a Life Guard. Give blood to 
 save life. help blood banks to get their needed blood units 
 and save someone's life help doctor to save lifes /*Sign in*/ Welcome , Start 
 controlling donations Enter Password Sign In Forgot Password Do not have an account? sign up Email address
back_icon /*Sign UP*/ Full name Start Your Journey 
 With Us By signing up you accept the Terms of 
 Service and Privacy Policy. Birthday Do have an account? Sign in Sign Up
/*forget password*/ Enter your email and we’ll send you 
 instructions on how to reset your password. Forget password
/*check email*/ Check Your Email close We’ve sent instructions on how to reset 
 The password (also check the Spam folder). Go To Email
/*map*/ Map
/*add request*/ Need A Blood ? Here you can ask our community members to donate for you by completing the form down here in which hospital are you? add number Enter patient file number select one please Blood Type needed Enter number of units Hospital Notes add notes add Request /*donation_history*/ Welcome back!
